1 /* Libraries */
2 #include "ros/ros.h"
3 #include "std_msgs/UInt8.h"
4 #include <iostream>
5 #include <string>
6 
17 int main(int argc, char **argv)
18 {
19  /* Definitions */
20  std_msgs::UInt8 msg; // Command tag associated and published.
21  std::string cmd; // Command string parsed by speech recognition.
22 
23  /* Initialize and assign node handler */
24  ros::init(argc, argv, "interpreter");
25  ros::NodeHandle n;
26 
27  /* Initialize publisher */
28  ros::Publisher cmd_pub =
29  n.advertise<std_msgs::UInt8>("command", 1);
30 
31  /* Update rate (period) */
32  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
33 
34  ROS_INFO("Command Interpreter node active");
35 
36  /* Main loop */
37  while (ros::ok())
38  {
39  /* Receiving input from the user */
40  std::cout << "Awaiting command: ";
41  std::cin >> cmd;
42 
43  /* Command-tag mapping */
44  if (!cmd.compare("look")) msg.data = 1;
45  else if (!cmd.compare("go")) msg.data = 2;
46  else if (!cmd.compare("stop")) msg.data = 3;
47  else msg.data = 0;
48 
49  /* Publish only in case something meaningful was received */
50  if(msg.data>0)
51  {
52  cmd_pub.publish(msg);
53  ROS_INFO("Sent command: [%s] to master",cmd.data());
54  }
55 
56  /* Spin and wait for next period */
57  ros::spinOnce();
58  loop_rate.sleep();
59  }
60 
61  return 0;
62 }
